title: How many characters are allowed in a text message?
answer:
A text message contains maximum of 160 English characters or 70 Chinese characters.

A long text message contains up to 7 pages. If the message content is longer than 8 pages, the message will be automatically converted to a multimedia message.

This is applicable to mobile phones sold in China and customized by China Mobile but not in all markets. This feature is market demand-driven.
